analysis.key_quote: It would allow for a President to put unqualified sycophants in place to do his bidding no matter the consequences to life, health, safety, or national security.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses significant concerns about the vagueness of the proposed rule and its potential to politicize civil service positions, which aligns with opposition to the rule. It highlights the risks of undermining merit-based evaluations and due process protections.
